files.patch:
@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@

+# Copyright (c) 2004, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -66,1 +66,12 @@
-"$JAVA" ${TESTVMOPTS} -classpath "${TESTCLASSES}" Setup "${TESTCLASSES}" Agent
+OS=`uname -s`
+case ${OS} in
+    CYGWIN*)
+        CYGWIN="CYGWIN"
+        ;;
+    *)
+        CYGWIN=""
+        ;;
+esac
+
+"$JAVA" ${TESTVMOPTS} -classpath "${TESTCLASSES}" Setup "${TESTCLASSES}" Agent "${CYGWIN}"
+
